title: 110_s1962
content: Regional Ground and Surface Water Enhancement Program Act of 2007 - Amends the Food Security Act of 1985 to direct the Secretary of Agriculture to: (1) identify areas in which protecting or improving water quality or water quantity, or both, is a priority. (2) establish a regional water enhancement program to improve agricultural water quality or water quantity. And (3) invite prospective partners to submit competitive grant proposals for regional water enhancement partnerships.
